feed.title: Mini QR Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.22.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add multiline support for frame text by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/156
  • Add debounced QR code updates by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/157
  • Add frame preset feature by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.21.0...v0.22.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.23.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add BASE_PATH support for deployment and update environment variables by @pcbimon in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/165
  • Add VITE_HIDE_CREDITS option by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/163
  • Add environment variables for presets and local storage configuration by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/167
  • Add VITE_DEFAULT_DATA_TO_ENCODE environment variable by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/170
  • Update it.json by @unililium in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.22.0...v0.23.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.24.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add CC and BCC fields to email template by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/169
  • Fix frame preference persistence by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/174

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.23.0...v0.24.0

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.24.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Attempt to fix docker env variables not set by @lyqht in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/173
  • fixes #176 path mismatch in docker-compose.yml by @matthewberryman in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/177

New Contributors

  • @matthewberryman made their first contribution in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/177

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.24.0...v0.24.1

entry.title: New release for Mini QR: v0.24.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • de.json Translation correction by @Mr-Robot-ops in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/179

New Contributors

  • @Mr-Robot-ops made their first contribution in https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/pull/179

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lyqht/mini-qr/compare/v0.24.1...v0.24.2
